intro_text: The DisplayDecoder Module converts a 4-bit input value into a display value on the seven segment display of the FPGA. The DisplayDecoder is able to output a hexadecimal display value between 0 and F.
input_text: The DisplayDecoder module takes a 4-bit binary value input, data, as its only input.
output_text: The DisplayDecoder module outputs a 7-bit binary value that is used to activate specific segments in the FPGA seven segment display.
